mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ROWID()
insert into fmea_basic_information (company, project, fmea_number, project_site, fmea_start_time, design_response, customer_name, fmea_update_time, level_confident, platform, cross_function_team, fmea_id ) values (#{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designResponse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaUpdateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{levelConfident,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crossFunctionTeam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update fmea_basic_information set company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_number = #{fmeaNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_site = #{projectSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_start_time = #{fmeaStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_response = #{designResponse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_update_time = #{fmeaUpdateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level_confident = #{levelConfident,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cross_function_team = #{crossFunctionTeam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_id = #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, company, project, fmea_number, project_site, fmea_start_time, design_response, customer_name, fmea_update_time, level_confident, platform, cross_function_team, fmea_id from fmea_basic_information where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, company, project, fmea_number, project_site, fmea_start_time, design_response, customer_name, fmea_update_time, level_confident, platform, cross_function_team, fmea_id from fmea_basic_information

select id, company, project, fmea_number, project_site, fmea_start_time, design_response, customer_name, fmea_update_time, level_confident, platform, cross_function_team, fmea_id from fmea_basic_information where fmea_id=#{fmeaId}
